nodes.text: The Army of the First Line was an organization that was active around the time of the formation of the Galactic Empire.

Vlaydm Churhee served as a sharpshooter in the Army of the First Line on Ulda Frav. In the decade following the end of the Clone Wars, Vlaydm Churhee used this experience to form a mercenary unit named after him: Churhee's Riflemen.
